SELECT t.package_id as packageId, t.start_amount as startAmount, CONCAT('单笔投资',t.start_amount,'元即可使用' ) as brief, t.package_amount as packageAmount, CONCAT(t.start_time,'--', t.end_time) AS validateTime, t.rel_order_no as relationOrder, CONCAT('在',TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,t.start_time,t.end_time),'天内有效, 任意标地均可使用') as description FROM rqb_package_info t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} and t.is_valid='Y'
and t.is_use='Y'
and t.is_use='N' and DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and t.is_use='N' and DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
LIMIT #{page},10

SELECT t.coupons_id as couponsId, t.start_period_start as startPeriodStart, CONCAT('理财标的',t.start_period_start,'个月以上,任意金额,即可使用' ) as brief, t.add_profit as accrual, CONCAT(t.start_time,'--', t.end_time) AS validateTime, t.rel_order_no as relationOrder, CONCAT('在',TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,t.start_time,t.end_time),'天内有效, 任意标地均可使用') as description FROM rqb_coupons_info t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} and t.is_valid='Y'
and t.is_use='Y'
and t.is_use='N' and DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and t.is_use='N' and DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
LIMIT #{page},10
